name: Escape This Place - Chapter 1
description:
Chapter 1

Trapped.

You awoke with no memories of who you once were.

This cabin is your cozy prison.

Can you find out who you are and Escape this Place?

Find your way out of the Cabin in this escape puzzle game!

Walkthrough is included as a pdf in case you get stuck.

Donate to help out some more! Chapter 2 wants to get made!

Controls / Instructions

  • Use the mouse or touchscreen for everything
  • Click places to move toward them
  • Hovering over areas on the screen, or pressing and holding on them will show a cursor image on special areas
  • Clicking a Feet cursor will move your character to a new area
  • Clicking a Magnifying Glass cursor will inspect an area
  • Clicking a Puzzle Pieces cursor will view interactive area
  • Using an item on a Question Mark cursor might cause an event
  • Clicking a Hand cursor will pick something up
